amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 116-200 to contract the study entitled "Review and Update of Bureau of Safety and Environmental Enforcement Offshore Oil and Gas Operations Inspection Program" to the National Academy of Sciences, Engineering, and Medicine.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barragan amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Barragan.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Barragan amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
